meanings.definition: Not designated for a specific purpose or recipient
meanings.sent1: The unearmarked funds could be used for any project.
meanings.sent2: The charity received an unearmarked donation.
meanings.sent3: The unearmarked money decided to take a vacation instead of being spent.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an unearmarked box, full of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The unearmarked field stretched out before us, ready for exploration.

meanings.definition: Not set aside for a particular use or project
meanings.sent1: The unearmarked budget allowed for flexibility in spending.
meanings.sent2: The unearmarked supplies were available for any department to use.
meanings.sent3: The unearmarked cookies mysteriously disappeared from the office kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His unearmarked time slipped away unnoticed.
meanings.sent5: The unearmarked path led us through the forest, with no clear destination.
